description:
If you're in search of a carabiner built to withstand the rigors of sport climbing, consider the Petzl Djinn Bent Gate Carabiner. Crafted from aluminum, this carabiner boasts an H-shaped cross-section that strikes the perfect balance between strength and weight.

  • Its wide rope contact area minimizes rope drag and extends the lifespan of both the carabiner and the rope
  • The bent gate design facilitates smooth and efficient rope clipping, while the keylock system prevents any snagging on ropes or bolt hangers
  • With its generous size, it's easy to handle and grab, even when wearing gloves
name: Petzl Djinn Bent Gate Carabiner
